DOC.brief_summary: Some study report selenium status associate cognitive function . However report investigate whether selenium supplementation benefit cognitive performance selenium supplementation exclusive . Also , none report use food rich selenium source supplementation . Thus , aim study investigate whether consumption Brazil nut improves cognitive function . We hypothesize daily consumption Brazil nut would benefit selenium status , increase antioxidant enzyme activity improve cognitive function old adult MCI .
DOC.brief_title: Brazil Nuts Effects Selenium Status Cognitive Performance
DOC.detailed_description: We enrol old patient MCI attend Memory Aging Unit Geriatrics Division , University São Paulo Medical School ( Brazil ) . All participant fulfil criterion propose International Working Group Mild Cognitive Impairment ( Winblad et al. , 2004 ) , include follow : ( 1 ) person neither normal demented ; ( 2 ) evidence cognitive deterioration show subjective report conjunction objective cognitive deficit ; ( 3 ) activity daily live preserve complex instrumental function either intact minimally impaired . The diagnosis MCI base comprehensive neuropsychological assessment include Consortium Establish Registry Alzheimer 's Disease ( CERAD ) neuropsychological battery ( Welsh et al. , 1994 ; Bertolucci et al. , 2001 ) . Participants recruit May 2011 August 2012 . Eligible subject age 60 year old , fluent Portuguese , free significant neurologic psychiatric disease . None present major depression psychosis , regular intake Brazil nut , use supplement selenium , intolerance oleaginous food . An informed consent obtain interview participant . The research protocol approve Research Ethics Comittee Faculdade de Ciências Farmacêuticas da Universidade de São Paulo .
DOC.criteria: age 60 year old , fluent Portuguese , free significant neurologic psychiatric disease
